Check:
  all:

      operator:
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0548
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when --ORREF is not in the same units as --ORRES
Outcome:
  Message: --ORREF is not in the same units as --ORRES
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0548
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: --ORREF uses the same units as --ORRES, if applicable.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --ORREF
                Section: Findings
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - FINDINGS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL
